author: Corey Lilliston
text: Very Special Day in NJM w/ @JennNJM @DorelHD @BrianFi02027912 … Having the pleasure of visiting the store I started in 23.5 years ago was humbling.. Kudos to the team in store 939! Store looked Fantastic!! https://t.co/0jxtObFDY7

author: Corey Lilliston
text: My brother! Love you man! @BHommerbocker https://t.co/8ZCNaAykRf

author: Corey Lilliston
text: Thank You D107 & NJM for an incredible 22 year run! Many friendships & bonds formed over the years that will forever be cherished… Excited to start my next role & continue serving our Great associates across THD!
